data.name: Uptobox - Spoiler
data.description: Delete the video previsualization in order to avoid spoilers.

data.name: fastmail.com sans-serif 2020
data.description: Get rid of the Proxima Nova mistake in Fastmail's March 2020 UI update. Also flattens some of the pointless linear gradients added to the buttons and tightens the spacing in the menu and highlights unread message rows (easy to remove)

data.name: Cute Stars <3
Facebook - Rounded, dark theme + Adblock v1.4.2
data.description:
Facebook - Rounded, dark theme design by Makoto.


If you find bug please tell mi about that :D

data.name: BetterDark for qBittorrent Web UI v1.1
data.description:
Clean, readable dark mode UI for qBittorrent Web, with blue accents.

Don't forget to edit the URL to your local WebUI one.
